nodes.text: Triank was a male Human who served the Ord Mantell Central Authority's army on the planet Ord Mantell, where a civil war had broken out with the Mantellian Separatist Movement. Triank was posted on the outskirts of Fort Garnik on Avilatan island, where he operated a stall from which he sold medium armor. While at his stall Triank wore blue armor and white pants. He had fair skin, brown hair and green eyes.
Triank first appeared in the 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare.
